verses.verse: Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5087>makes<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7650>takes<s%> an <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> with a <S%H632>binding<s%> <S%H632>obligation,<s%> he shall not <S%H2490>violate<s%> his <S%H1697>word;<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

"Also <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5087>makes<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H631>binds<s%> herself by an <S%H632>obligation<s%> in her father's <S%H1004>house<s%> in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%>

and her father <S%H1>hears<s%> her <S%H8085>vow<s%> and her <S%H5088>obligation<s%> by <S%H632>which<s%> she has <S%H834>bound<s%> <S%H631>herself,<s%> and her father <S%H5315>says<s%> <S%H1>nothing<s%> to her, then <S%H2790>all<s%> her <S%H2790>vows<s%> shall <S%H3605>stand,<s%> and <S%H5088>every<s%> <S%H6965>obligation<s%> by <S%H3605>which<s%> she has <S%H632>bound<s%> <S%H834>herself<s%> shall <S%H631>stand.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> her father should <S%H1>forbid<s%> her on the <S%H5106>day<s%> he <S%H3117>hears<s%> [of it,] <S%H8085>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of her <S%H3808>vows<s%> or her <S%H5088>obligations<s%> by <S%H632>which<s%> she has <S%H834>bound<s%> <S%H631>herself<s%> shall <S%H5315>stand;<s%> and the <S%H6965>Lord<s%> will <S%H3068>forgive<s%> her <S%H5545>because<s%> her father had <S%H3588>forbidden<s%> her.

"However, <S%H518>if<s%> she should <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H376><s%> while <S%H5921>under<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H4008>rash<s%> <S%H4008>statement<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5315>herself,<s%>

and her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> of it and <S%H2790>says<s%> <S%H2790>nothing<s%> to her on the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H8085>hears<s%> [it,] then her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> and her <S%H632>obligations<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5315>herself<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> [of it,] he <S%H5106>forbids<s%> her, then he shall <S%H6565>annul<s%> her <S%H5088>vow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she is <S%H5921>under<s%> and the <S%H4008>rash<s%> <S%H4008>statement<s%> of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5315>herself;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

"But the <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H490>widow<s%> or of a <S%H1644>divorced<s%> woman, <S%H3605>everything<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> she has <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5315>herself,<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her.
"However, <S%H518>if<s%> she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> in her husband's <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5315>herself<s%> by an <S%H632>obligation<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath,<s%>

and her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it,] but <S%H2790>said<s%> <S%H2790>nothing<s%> to her [and] did not <S%H5106>forbid<s%> her, then <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>obligation<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H5315>herself<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6565>indeed<s%> <S%H6565>annuls<s%> them on the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H8085>hears<s%> [them,] then <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H4161>proceeds<s%> out of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> concerning her <S%H5088>vows<s%> or concerning the <S%H632>obligation<s%> of <S%H5315>herself,<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand;<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> has <S%H6565>annulled<s%> them, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> her.

<S%H3605>"Every<s%> <S%H5088>vow<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H632>binding<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H6031>humble<s%> <S%H5315>herself,<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> may <S%H6965>confirm<s%> it or her <S%H376>husband<s%> may <S%H6565>annul<s%> it.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H2790>indeed<s%> <S%H2790>says<s%> <S%H2790>nothing<s%> to her from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day,<s%> then he <S%H6965>confirms<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H632>obligations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on her; he has <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> them, <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2790>said<s%> <S%H2790>nothing<s%> to her on the <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
"But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H6565>indeed<s%> <S%H6565>annuls<s%> them <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> them, then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> her <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>"

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> [as] <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> [and as] <S%H996>between<s%> a father and his <S%H1>daughter,<s%> [while she is] in her <S%H1323>youth<s%> in her father's <S%H5271>house.<s%>
